goals.description: Address unrecovered Conversion Rates (CR) and declining Active Order Rates (AOR)
Improve empty conversions and acceptance rates through Charge at Checkout
Drive Free Add-on take rates to over 90% consistently
Close the gaps with new delivery options with 1 day cutoff

key_results.target: +90% for both new and active users consistently

key_results.metric: Reactivation Free Add-on Take Rate (multi-add-on pop-up)

in_scope: Closing Free Add-on Take Rate gaps
Multi-add-on pop-up on funnel and reactivation
New delivery options with 1 day cutoff
CDP v2 to fix data lag
deprioritized: Ability to change cadence on reactivation page
Ability to reschedule directly on reactivation page
Pricing Value Experiment (pushed to next year)

dependencies: Marketing collaboration for rebranding and value-driven communications
CDP v2 for data lag fixes
Legal compliance initiatives in cancellation funnel

risks.risk: Inadequate resource planning for adhoc and technical initiatives - only 2 out of 5 key strategies executed in H2 2025
risks.mitigation: Better proactive accounting for technical initiatives like endpoint deprecations and migrations; improved capacity planning

risks.risk: Personnel changes impacting engineering capacity (transfer to TPT, two parental leaves in Sept-Oct)
risks.mitigation: Account for 3 parental fill and 2 backfills; plan for Q2 expansion to 7 FE devs + 1EM + 2 POs + 2 new FE devs + 1 BE

risks.risk: Insufficient space for iterations - delays implementing learnings and business value realization
risks.mitigation: Prioritize iterations over new initiatives; reduce time between iteration cycles to prevent team re-learning

risks.risk: OTP launch delay due to technical investigation and unplanned capacity constraints
risks.mitigation: Moved from MVP hack to proper solution; launch rescheduled to W2'2026

risks.risk: Significant Q3 engineering capacity allocated to Wallet take rate gap (not in original H2 roadmap)
risks.mitigation: Better upfront roadmap planning and capacity allocation

Improve empty conversions and acceptance rates through Charge at Checkout
Maintain Free Add-on take rates over 90% consistently

key_results.metric: Free Add-on Take Rate increase from persisting
Free Add-on Take Rate increase from multi-add-on pop-up

dependencies: CRM technical blocker resolution for OTP
ProcessOut integration for payment capabilities (express checkout, BNPL)
CDP v2 for fixing data lag
Data infrastructure for OTP attribution and scalability
Bob attribution system based on vouchers

risks.mitigation: Proactively account for endpoint deprecations, migrations, and tactical initiatives in planning

risks.risk: Personnel changes impacting engineering capacity (transfers, parental leave)
risks.mitigation: Better capacity planning with backfills (3 parental fill, 2 backfills planned)

risks.risk: OTP launch delay due to technical investigation and capacity constraints
risks.mitigation: Moved to proper technical solution; launch targeted for W2'2026

risks.risk: Limited space for iterations delaying business value realization
risks.mitigation: Balance new initiatives with iteration work; avoid long gaps between iterations

risks.risk: OTP scaling limited by data attribution issues
risks.mitigation: Significant data infrastructure work needed before scaling marketing

goals.description: Address unrecovered Conversion Rates (CR) and declining Active Order Rates (AOR)
Improve empty conversions and acceptance rates through Charge at Checkout
Maintain Free Add-on take rates over 90% consistently

in_scope: Free Add-on persistence and selection improvements
deprioritized: Ability to change cadence on reactivation page
Ability to reschedule directly on reactivation page

dependencies: Data scalability for OTP marketing attribution

risks.risk: Inadequate resource planning for adhoc and technical initiatives - only 2 out of 5 key strategies executed in H2 2025
risks.mitigation: Proactively account for technical initiatives like endpoint deprecations and migrations; better planning for unplanned capacity constraints

risks.risk: Personnel changes impacting engineering capacity (transfer to TPT, two parental leaves in September-October)
risks.mitigation: Q1: 7 FE devs with 3 parental fill, 2 backfills; Q2: +2 FE devs, +2 returning (Bolo & Richa), +1 BE

risks.risk: Insufficient space for iterations - delays implementing learnings and business value realization
risks.mitigation: Prioritize iterations over new initiatives; reduce time between iterations to avoid re-learning technical context

risks.risk: OTP launch delay (W2'2026) due to additional technical investigation and unplanned capacity constraints
risks.mitigation: Pivoted to proper solution instead of MVP hack to save long-term time

risks.risk: Significant Q3 engineering capacity allocated to Free Add-on work not originally in H2 roadmap
risks.mitigation: Better upfront planning and resource allocation

risks.risk: OTP scalability issues from data perspective - would drive blind without proper attribution
risks.mitigation: Plan for significant effort to make it scalable after positive test results
